# TCP

**Structure**

The system definition of the Transmission Control Protocol (TCP).

## Declaration

```swift
struct TCP
```

## Overview

Supports sending and receiving byte streams.

## Initializers

- **init()**: Create an instance of TCP.
- **init(_:)**: Create an instance of TCP.

## Instance Methods

- **ackStretchingDisabled(_:)**: Disable ACK stretching.
- **connectionTimeout(_:)**: Set the timeout for TCP connection establishment.
- **ecnDisabled(_:)**: Disable ECN negotiation.
- **fastOpenAllowed(_:)**: Configure TCP to enable TCP Fast Open (TFO).
- **keepalive(idleTimeInSeconds:count:intervalInSeconds:)**: Enable TCP keepalives.
- **maximumSegmentSize(_:)**: Set maximum segment size.
- **noDelay(_:)**: Disable Nagle’s algorithm.
- **noOptions(_:)**: Enable no-options mode.
- **noPush(_:)**: Enable no-push mode.
- **persistTimeout(_:)**: Set the TCP persist timeout.
- **retransmitConnectionDropTime(_:)**: Set the TCP retransmission attempt timeout.
- **retransmitFinDrop(_:)**: Configure TCP to drop the connection after a FIN does not receive an ACK.

## Conforms To

- NetworkProtocolOptions
- OneToOneProtocol
- StreamProtocol
